TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WifiManager extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides the primary API for managing all aspects of Wi-Fi connectivity.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the set of variables that describe the configuration, contained in a object. If the has an Http Proxy set the calling app must be System, or be provisioned as the Profile or Device Owner.
Docs.summary: Add a new network description to the set of configured networks.
Docs.returns: the ID of the newly created network description. This is used in other operations to specified the network to be acted upon. Returns -1 on failure.

Docs.summary: Add or update a Passpoint configuration.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception:
if configuration is invalid or Passpoint is not enabled on the device. Deprecated for general app usage - except DO/PO apps. See to create a passpoint suggestion. See , for new API to add Wi-Fi networks for consideration when auto-connecting to wifi. Compatibility Note: For applications targeting or above, this API will always fail and throw .

Deprecation Exemptions:

  • Device Owner (DO), Profile Owner (PO) and system apps.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CalculateSignalLevel(int32 rssi) cil managed

Docs.param: a raw RSSI value, in dBm, usually between -55 and -90
Docs.summary: Given a raw RSSI, return the RSSI signal quality rating using the system default RSSI quality rating thresholds.
Docs.returns: the RSSI signal quality rating, in the range [0, ], where 0 is the lowest (worst signal) RSSI rating and is the highest (best signal) RSSI rating.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

The number of levels to consider in the calculated level.
Docs.summary: Given a raw RSSI, return the RSSI signal quality rating using the system default RSSI quality rating thresholds.
Docs.returns: the RSSI signal quality rating, in the range [0, ], where 0 is the lowest (worst signal) RSSI rating and is the highest (best signal) RSSI rating.

static member CompareSignalLevel : int * int -> int

Docs.param: The power of the first signal measured in RSSI.
The power of the second signal measured in RSSI.
Docs.summary: Compares two signal strengths.
Docs.returns: Returns <0 if the first signal is weaker than the second signal, 0 if the two signals have the same strength, and >0 if the first signal is stronger than the second signal.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype Android.Net.Wifi.NetworkStatus RemoveNetworkSuggestions(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Net.Wifi.WifiNetworkSuggestion> networkSuggestions) cil managed

Docs.param: List of network suggestions to be removed. Pass an empty list to remove all the previous suggestions provided by the app.
Docs.summary: Remove some or all of the network suggestions that were previously provided by the app.
Docs.returns: Status code for the operation. One of the STATUS_NETWORK_SUGGESTIONS_ values. Any matching suggestions are removed from the device and will not be considered for any further connection attempts.

Docs.param: LocalOnlyHotspotCallback for the application to receive updates about operating status.
Handler to be used for callbacks. If the caller passes a null Handler, the main thread will be used.
Docs.summary: Request a local only hotspot that an application can use to communicate between co-located devices connected to the created WiFi hotspot.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 UpdateNetwork(class Android.Net.Wifi.WifiConfiguration config) cil managed
abstract member UpdateNetwork : Android.Net.Wifi.WifiConfiguration -> int override this.UpdateNetwork : Android.Net.Wifi.WifiConfiguration -> int

Docs.param: the set of variables that describe the configuration, contained in a object. It may be sparse, so that only the items that are being changed are non-null. The networkId field must be set to the ID of the existing network being updated. If the has an Http Proxy set the calling app must be System, or be provisioned as the Profile or Device Owner.
Docs.summary: Update the network description of an existing configured network.
Docs.returns:
Returns the networkId of the supplied WifiConfiguration on success.
Returns -1 on failure, including when the networkId field of the WifiConfiguration does not refer to an existing network.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
